data.title: Marketing Strategy Meeting
data.desc: Discuss upcoming quarter's marketing campaigns and KPIs.

data.title: Design Review Session
data.desc: Team review of new product UI designs and feedback session.

data.title: Monthly Townhall
data.desc: Leadership presents company updates and answers Q&A.

data.title: Client Demo Presentation
data.desc: Demo the new software module to the client stakeholders.

data.title: Product Sprint Planning
data.desc: Sprint planning for the next 2 weeks with dev and QA teams.

data.title: Webinar: Tech Trends 2025
data.desc: External webinar covering upcoming technology and AI trends.

data.title: Team Building Activity
data.desc: Fun team-building activities and games with HR and staff.

data.title: QA Automation Kickoff
data.desc: Kickoff meeting to introduce automation framework goals.

data.title: Security Awareness Training
data.desc: Mandatory training for all employees on security protocols.

data.title: Sales Forecast Meeting
data.desc: Review pipeline data and projections for next quarter.

data.title: UX Feedback Session
data.desc: Collect feedback from users on recent UX improvements.

data.title: Data Analytics Workshop
data.desc: Hands-on workshop covering business insights using data.

data.title: Engineering Hackathon
data.desc: 24-hour coding challenge to prototype innovative solutions.

data.title: Board of Directors Meeting
data.desc: Quarterly meeting with the board to present performance and goals.

data.title: CSR Volunteering Day
data.desc: Company-wide community service event to give back.
